name: truecaller
features: Bank grade security provided by ICICI Bank
description: Manage all your calls and messages quickly, by filtering out telemarketers and other unwanted disturbances. With a community-based spam list updated by millions of users worldwide, Truecaller is the only app you need to make your communication safe and efficient.
Truecaller is the world’s best Caller ID and spam blocking app - 50 crore downloads worldwide.Truecaller does not upload your phonebook to make it public or searchable.

name: paytm_first_games
description: Join the community of 1 Million+ players and have lots of fun playing these games every day!
🎁💰 Play Games & Win Paytm Cash every day!
Free Games: All our games are absolutely free to play. No need to add money! Just play with Points & win rewards!
🛡️ ⚔️ Battlecenter: Play multiplayer games, Player vs Player games and exclusive Tournaments to win Paytm Cash
💬 Chat and Play With Friends: Chat with your friends and challenge them for a game or contest.
🤝 Make New Friends: Play games & chat with real people online and make new friends every day.
🏏 Fantasy Sports: Become a captain of your own Fantasy Cricket team and win Paytm Cash

name: uber
features: Elegance and premium features with Uber Black
Bank grade security provided by ICICI Bank
description: With Uber, your destination is at your fingertips. Just open the app and enter where you want to go, and a nearby driver will help you get there reliably. You can also rent JUMP bikes and scooters.
Available at more than 600 airports and in 700+ cities around the world, Uber is a great way to make your travel plans stress-free. Request a ride on demand or schedule one ahead of time.
Whether you’re looking for style, space, or affordability, Uber can help you find the perfect ride to fit your needs

name: urbanclap
description: UrbanClap is now called Urban Company!
Choose from over 50+ services and book home services on the app based on pre-approved prices. Avail at-home services from trusted and background-verified professionals.

Currently available in: New Delhi, Bangalore, Mumbai, Chennai, Hyderabad, Pune, Ahmedabad, Jaipur, Kolkata, Chandigarh, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Visakhapatnam (or Vizag), Vadodara, Noida, Greater Noida, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Ghaziabad, Thane, Navi Mumbai, Secunderabad, Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sydney, Singapore

name: mxplayer
features: PINCH TO ZOOM, ZOOM AND PAN
description: Powerful video player with advanced hardware acceleration and subtitle support.

name: times_prime
features: Sign Up --> Activate Offers --> Enjoy benefits!
Sign Up - Download the Times Prime app & register using your mobile number to start your 30-day free offers
Activate Offers - Select memberships & offers you like and click to Activate them
Enjoy benefits! - Goto the partner site/ app & login using the same mobile number to start availing benefits!
description: First of its kind lifestyle membership with access to multiple subscription services, brand offers, and events under a single roof. Our partners are market leaders in categories such as OTT Platforms, Dining, Food delivery, Entertainment & Media, Travel & Hotels, Grocery delivery, Online Shopping, Beauty & Wellness, Health & Medicine, Home care services and many more. We work with 25+ top brands in the country including Uber, PVR, Myntra, BigBasket, Oyo, Swiggy, Gaana, Times of India and many more. Try 12 offers for a month for free or Buy annual membership at 30% off using exciting payment offers from HDFC Timescard, Timespoints and Paytm.

Join millions of subscribers who enjoy the benefits of Gaana plus, TOI plus, Gourmet Passport (by DineOut), Swiggy Super and many other premium memberships. Also, get exciting offers on events & activities in your city courtesy our events partner - Insider. All this while you save up to Rs 60,000 every year!

name: coupert
description: Coupert automatically finds coupons, applies best coupon code at checkout & gives you cashback.
Besides, Coupert gives you the best rate of cashback for more than thousands of online stores like Walmart, Macy's, Booking.com, Expedia.com, Forever 21, and Finish Line.
Coupert is also a smart Aliexpress coupon finder.

The Coupert Chrome extension uses Google Analytics to collect usage statistics to improve user experience. You can opt-out of Google Analytics tracking by visiting http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

name: zoomin
description: Whether it’s a birthday, wedding, or anything else life sends your way, Zoomin is right there with you. By printing your favourite photos onto anything and everything, we make customisation as easy as clicking a button.
Perfect for when you’re looking to change your decor, treat a friend, or just put a smile on your face.

name: zee5
description: Looking for exciting entertainment in your own language, ZEE5 is your destination.
Enjoy binge-watching ZEE5 original shows, World Digital Premieres of blockbuster movies, TV shows, News, Music Videos & 90+ LIVE TV channels.

name: stepsetgo
description: Walk to earn SSG Coins. Use these SSG Coins to redeem awesome rewards. Rewards can be exclusive discounts or amazing products that are completely FREE!

It shows you the steps you have walked today. The level on which you are at, the distance you have covered and the calories you have burned today and your total SSG Coin balance. It also shows you the Daily Rewards. Daily rewards are an easy way to earn more SSG Coins for free!
1000 Basic steps (Indoor steps) = 1.25 SSG Coins
1000 Outdoor steps = 1.00 SSG Coins

SSG has been created to become a perfect companion to walk along with you on your fitness journey. May it be redeeming amazing offers or products by just walking, competing with your friends in the fitness challenges or simply keeping a track of your steps, distance, calories - walking with SSG will always be rewarding!

name: paisawapas
features: Deals and Discounts on food delivery
description: India’s Best Coupons, Sale Offers, Deals, Discount Coupons & Extra Cashback App

PaisaWapas App provides you with the top latest coupons, offers, deals, discounts, Promo codes (promotional code), coupon codes, on movie tickets, food, recharge, restaurants, flight ticket bookings on more than 500+ top online Indian retail stores like Amazon, Flipkart, Jabong, Amazon, Paytm, Ajio, Snapdeal, MakeMyTrip, Yatra.com and offer cashback on every order.

name: zupee_gold
description: Win real money by playing tournaments everyday, all day.
Choose from over 500 topics to play a tournament!
Pick a tournament of your choice & win real money for answering simple questions.
Check the prize distribution, scoring and tournament details, and proceed to register.
Start playing! Give answers as quickly as you can. The sooner you respond, the higher you score!
Cash out money into your PayTM account instantly.

name: redbus
features: Andhra Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation (APSRTC)
West Bengal Surface Transport Corporation WBTC (CTC)
Uttar Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation (UPSRTC)
description: redBus offers a quick and simple booking process to procure bus tickets on luxury buses and at a low price.

All you have to do is enter your departure and destination locations along with the date of your planned journey. Choose from a plethora of bus operators offering a variant of buses that are available on the route. Use any of the filters like bus types, pick-up and drop-off locations, prices, ratings and reviews, etc. to help you arrange your options accordingly, thereby offering a unique search.

Select your seat, complete your payment, and that’s it! You have now successfully booked your bus ticket online with redBus bus ticket booking app. Avail any of the numerous discounts and cashback offers that are available on the app!

redBus also offers carpool and bike pooling services. rPool offers travel insurance to those who use this feature to travel from one point to another. Along with privacy protection, rPool also provides its users with the opportunity to earn rewards through rPool points when you use the app
